formatDescription: This format is created by the TibetDoc word-processing software for Windows. It was developed by the Padma Karpo Translation Committee, and was created specifically to support the Tibetan language and fonts within a word processor, but also supports multiple other languages and fonts, for example Sanskrit and English.
provenanceCompoundName: Buddhist Digital Resource Center / Buddhist Digital Resource Center

internalSignatures.name: TibetDoc
internalSignatures.note: BOF; Offset: 1; Magic Bytes: 'PKTC' with a 3 byte gap and then 'TibetDoc'
